value.title: Meta Unmasks Hundreds Of AI Spies On Facebook And Instagram Made By Italian Surveillance Dealers

value.title: ‘AI Girlfriends’ Are a Privacy Nightmare

value.title: A baby llama has possibly been stolen from Maine farm
value.excerpt: Mainers should be on the lookout for a baby llama that was possibly stolen from a farm in Acton. Acton Animal Control Officer Jim Driscoll was notified Sunday about a possibly stolen llama. He is asking farmers and neighbors in the area of Foxes Ridge and County roads to look out for the animal.

value.title: Meta Platforms to deploy in-house custom chips this year to power AI drive: internal memo
